column4: BRIEF-Ennis Says On May 2, Co Through A Unit Acquired Allen-Bailey Tag & Label
column6: * ENNIS SAYS ON MAY 2, CO THROUGH A UNIT ACQUIRED ALLEN-BAILEY TAG & LABEL IN A PURCHASE OF ASSETS & ASSUMPTION OF TRADE PAYABLES - SEC FILING Source text: (bit.ly/2FEO7bI) Further company coverage:
